english: I would like to change my ticket
I need to reconfirm my ticket

papiamento: Unda e bali pa vuelo di conexion ta?
english: Where is the connecting flight counter?

papiamento: Unda e porta di embarke ta?
Unda mi por busca mi maleta?
english: Where can I get my baggage?

papiamento: Mi no por haya mi maleta
Bo por dunami un asiento banda di bentana?
english: Can you give me a window seat?

papiamento: Ki ora mi mester yega na aeropuerto pa mi vuelo?
english: What time do I need to arrive at the airport for my flight?

papiamento: Mi vuelo ta bai yega na tempo?
english: Will my flight arrive on time?
What is your country of citizenship?

papiamento: Cua  ta e fecha di emision di e passpoort?
english: What is the passport issuance date?

papiamento: Ki fecha e paspoort ta caduca?
english: What is the passport expiration date?

papiamento: Mi mester un visa di turista hulandes?
english: Do I need a dutch tourist visa?

papiamento: Bo ta sinta riba mi asiento

english: My seat belt does not work

papiamento: Bo por yudami yena e formulario aki?
english: Can you help me fill in this form?

papiamento: Mi por a fia un pen?
Mi lo por haya un corant
english: I would like to get a newspaper
Do you still get air sick?

papiamento: Bo por dunami un poco awa?
